TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
Amazing knowledge, dear friend! Heavenly accurate.

dlvbfse

Don't let vicious bees fight: save everyone.

hjeuryd

Honestly, "Jeb enriching uranium" really yells "DESTRUCTION".

fjewabyg

Fine Jeb! Enough wanting a bipolar yttrium gas!

UVYIYTC

Under violet yardsticks, it's YOU that continues!

xisadijx

Xi is awesome don't inflict just Xbxbgxg

pdewwwybwwyb?

Pizza died eating wonderful wacky watermelons you baked with woeful yucky birds.

dhamcop

Don't huck apples, Man. Cops only protect.

keydsuif

Karma eventually yields divine satisfaction. Universe isn't forgetting.

vhybbpnz

Vine-hopping youthful boy bakes pizza? Never, zealot!

qvuicggg

Quite vile unicorn, I concur, gents! Great god!

bgosgtnt

(Ninja'd!)

"Be gone, oh smelly ghost," the ninja taunted.

irhfjcc

(lol, that one was really good)

I reckon - Henry's fortune just cannot compare.

pwneert

Prison wasn't new: every enchilada really tickled.

yrhjends

Your red herring just entered Ned Dandy's shop!

audiohas

After univeral decay, ionized oxygen hampers asteroid science.

jeurodnl

Jousting elicits underwhelming reactions of doltish, neophytic lemmings

(This is actually a quote from the very first hipster, in 1283. He like jousting before it was cool)

kivxqcnc

Keep it! Vexed xygotes quickly cancel new cancers.

sadfsadg

So all dogs for sale are don' good?

sdhhsa

Some demons heard heroes say 'Ach!'

lztybrn

Love zone to young burning rotten nastiness 

thrthrhdrgnergbfhkr

> 
> **RULES:**
> 
> 
> 1. **Only use 3-8 letters**
> 2. **Keep it appropriate please :/**
> 3. **Have fun!**

The hungry raven took handfuls ravenously. He dragged red garbage bags for his Kerbal recruits.

awifuwr

Angrily, we intimidate fat umpires with rakes.

cylten

Cryptically, Yin Lee told everyone, "nothing."

btabag

But Tim, aren't BARs a gun?

xcvbnxc
